column5: Does anyone have any experience with www.overstockbait.com??  If so, what were delivery times like to Canada and was there any brokerage or duty charges?

I have no experience with that particular store, but I almost always pay duty when purchasing baits from American retail stores. A good way to avoid taxes, and to pay cheaper postage is to get t=your purchase delivered to the states and to pick it up in the states yourself. A google search for "ship to buffalo" could give you some details.
etackle.ca is another great choice!  Phil will take care of you.
All good choices but without criticizing other stores, the one I cited has something at 40% off any other place I have checked.  It's hard to pass that up when I was planning on buying 2.
Make sure you add duty/brokerage and shipping to the overall price    If they don't ship USPS you'll REALLY get hammered with brokerage.  Goodluck!
